item.description:
I've decided to make this a meetup so members who want to go can easily collaborate and connect with Adam.

This will be a comedy hypnosis stage show delivered by Adam Justin, who, earlier this year was trained and certified in Vegas as a stage show hypnotist.

Stage shows are a blast!  They can also show you what hypnosis, in an entertainment atmosphere can do.

Tickets are free for members.

RSVP to this meetup should be enough without needing a call.  iI you don't rsvp, Adam must know ahead of time or call Jitto's at 603-436-9755 for advanced tickets.  Let them know you are friends of Adams from this meetup.

 

What a way to kick off the summer!  Have some fun with hypnosis and support your fellow members who are using their passion with hypnosis.

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Comedy Stage Show
